docs.title: The Kamihi Books
docs.text:
Documentation for the Kamihi framework.

Kamihi is a Python framework for creating and managing Telegram bots.

docs.title: kamihi
docs.text:

docs.title: hello
docs.text:
hello(name: str) -> str

Say hello to the user.

Examples:

>>> hello("Alice")
"Hello from Kamihi, Alice!"
>>> hello("Bob")
"Hello from Kamihi, Bob!"

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default str

The name of the user.

required

Returns:

Type Description str

The greeting message.

Source code in src/kamihi/__init__.py 
def hello(name: str) -> str:
    """
    Say hello to the user.

    Examples:
        >>> hello("Alice")
        "Hello from Kamihi, Alice!"
        >>> hello("Bob")
        "Hello from Kamihi, Bob!"

    Args:
        name: The name of the user.

    Returns:
        The greeting message.

    """
    return f"Hello from Kamihi, {name}!"
